document_data.name: ''Staff of Vision''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Staves of vision''''' were enchanted [[staff|staves]] that gave the wielder access to four vision-related spells.
document_data.Powers: A ''staff of vision''  contained the ''[[darkvision]]'', ''[[Remove blindness or deafness|remove blindness]]'' and ''[[see invisibility]]'' spells, and two copies of the ''[[true seeing]]'' spell. Each time one of these was used, there was a chance that the caster would become mentally fatigued. It was worth around 43,000 gold pieces.
document_data.Creation: The creation process of a ''staff of vision'' was possible for someone skilled in staff-crafting. The spells needed for the creation included ''darkvision'', ''see invisibility'', ''remove blindness'', and ''true seeing''.
